input_parameters.name: channel_name
input_parameters.description: The name of the channel; the function will attempt to create a channel name that follows Slack's channel name guidelines, but the channel's name may end up being different than the exact string provided.

input_parameters.name: is_private
input_parameters.description: Set to `true` if the channel should be private, set to `false` if the channel should be public.

output_parameters.name: channel_id
output_parameters.description: The conversation ID for the channel you created

output_parameters.name: manager_ids
output_parameters.description: Person(s) who were made channel manager
